title: Where does the last name Carrasquillo come from? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most possibly a diminutive form of Carrasco, which is derived form carrasca ( Quercus ilex - Wikipedia , a very common tree in Spain.) There is a very ancient town named Carrasco in Salamanca (Spain.) The suffix -illo is a very common diminutive form in that very same area or nearby:  There are around 120,000 people with the surname Carrasco in Spain and around 15 with the surname Carrasquillo.
